description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: The material in this course covers implantable, nonimplantable, and extracorporeal materials. Implantables include sutures, vascular grafts, artificial heart, artificial bones and ligaments, drug delivery device, artificial tissues, artificial liver,etc. Nonimplantable materials are : cloths in medical uses,  surgical dressings and gauze, injection device, diagonsis materials, etc. Extracorporeal materials are : dialysis fibers, artificial lung, catheters, etc.

description.zh: 椿基礎應用與分析，椿基礎數值分析與荷重行為，椿基施工與測試沉箱分析與施工，大地資源系統之應用，專題討論。
description.en: Deep Rudiment Engineering1.Applications and Analysis of Stake-Rudiment2.Numerical Analysis and Behavior of Load of   Stake-Rudiment3.Working and Test of Stake-Rudiment4.Applications of System of Geograph Resources5.Argumentation of Monograph

name.en: Interactive Installation and Performing Arts Technology

description.zh: 本課程介紹整合即時影像、即時音訊、實體裝置、及相關表演科技（如燈光控制、各類感應器應用等）之技術與應用實務，並藉由圖形化、物件導向程式設計系統，引導未有程式設計經驗的視覺設計者或輔助已有程式設計能力者，以更有效率的方式進行相關互動系統設計，藉以達成互動裝置、表演科技、與表演藝術之整合。
description.en: This course introduces the technology that help integrates real-time video, audio, installations, and associated performance arts technology (such as lighting control, the application of various types of sensors, etc.) into performing arts. Through a graphical, object-oriented programming system, the course is intended to help visual designers with no programming experiences or to assist experienced programmers to efficiently design the interactive systems that combine interactive installations, performance arts technology, and performing arts itself as a whole.

description.zh: 最近數年應用電腦軟體來計算分子的幾何形狀與力學數據已變得相當熱門，這些軟體不但計算小分子相當快速，即使是很複雜的分子也可行。本課程探討現行染料化學所常用軟體的應用範圍、準確性與限制條件並舉數個例子來顯現其優點。
description.en: Within the last few years, computer programs have been developed which are based on force-field methods, allowing for fast calculations of the molecular geometry and dynamics of single molecules as well as more complex systems.This course is designed to provide a survey of the commonly used theoretical methods in dye chemistry,to discuss their scope and limitations, and to present some examples as illustrations of their advantages.

description.zh: 此課程係提供對纖維材料加工特論之研究與理論有興趣的研究生。教學內容包括纖維、紗、織物的製造與加工方法；紡織物補強複合材料的製造與加工方法；射出、擠壓、熱壓及高溫高壓與複合成形方法；微細與超微細粒子在纖維材料上之應用；纖維材料之印染與整理加工；纖維材料在電子、航太、醫學、交通與農業材料上之應用。
description.en: This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of fiber materials processing and manufacturing. Lecture courses, organized on a modular basis, are provided in textiles (fiber, yarn, fabric) manufacturing and processing methods; textiles reinforced composite materials manufacturing and processing methods; injection, extrude and hot press fabricated methods; high pressure and temperature, microwave, and composite fabricated methods; use of fine and superfine particle in textile materials; printing and finishing for textiles; use of textiles in electronic, aerospace, medical, automobile, and agriculture materials ....etc.

description.zh: 最近數年應用電腦軟體來計算分子的幾何形狀與力學數據已變得相當熱門，這些軟體不但計算小分子相當快速，即使是很複雜的分子也可行。本課程探討現行染料化學所常用軟體的應用範圍、準確性與限制條件並舉數個例子來顯現其優點。

description.zh: 1.動態系統之機械負載：加速度、摩擦、位移及外力負載  2. 動態系統之模型化處理 3. 動態模擬與分析 4. 電腦輔助動態模擬 5. 結論
description.en: 1. System dynamic mechanical loading effects, including inertia, friction, displacement and forcing effects. 2. Dynamic system modeling 3. Dynamic analyses and simulations. 4. CAD-simulations  5. Conclusions.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討製造服務化相關議題如全球發展趨勢、製造服務化內涵、驅動力與轉換過程、產品服務系統、以及各國相關個案研討如歐盟製造服務化發展(Manufacture Platform)、芬蘭Tekes個案、美國產品服務化個案、IBM個案、及我國產業個案等研討。
description.en: The purpose of course is to study several issues on servitization like the global trend on servitization, the content, driving force, and transformation of servitization, and some case study of Europe Union's Manufacture Platform, Finland's Teke, USA, IBM, and Taiwan.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討效率市場假說下的異常現象，本課程以文獻討論為主，並且用心理學的理論來加以解釋投資人在金融市場的行為模式。
description.en: The empirical and theoretical evidence of the efficient market hypothesis (EMH) has been challenged in the past two decades. Behavioural finance has developed as an approach to try to explain financial market anomalies from the EMH. The aim of this course is to discuss the related financial literature and apply the psychological theory of individual behaviour to the financial markets. Group discussions are needed.

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括：（1）生產策略（2）產品設計與規劃（3）製程設計與規劃（4）廠址選擇（5）產能規劃（6）資源需求規劃（7）品質管理（8）物料管理（9）存貨管制。
description.en: The course mainly includes following topics：（1）operation strategy, （2）products planning and designing, （3）process planning and designing,（4）location strategy, （5）capacity planning, （6）material requirement planning, （7）quality management, （8）material management,（9）inventory management.

description.zh: 本課程整合心理學、社會學、 決策行為學等理論，介紹消費者的產品購買思維，以及產品消費行為，並討論企業如何應用消費 者行為分析的各項研究發現與理論，以提高行銷規劃與市場活動 效能。課程內容包括：1.消費購買的行為模式。2.消費行為的心理學與社會學基礎。3.消費者認知過程與心理發展。4.社會互動關係與購買行為。5.產品涉入對消費行為的影響。6.情境因素對消費行為的影響。7.態度的形成與改變。8.消費者行為分析在行銷管理的應用。學生修習本課程之後，將對行銷規劃之主要變數，如產品設計、零售企劃、廣告促銷、定價策略等，有一扎實的行為科學方面的理論基礎。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to help the student develop a good grasp of the variables that affect consumption and the implications of this knowledge for actual business decisions. Among the more specific goals, the course should improve the student's ability to: 1. Understand the sociological and psychological variables that shape the consumer decision process, 2. Identify various ways to segment a consumer market, 3. Examine the target market before making marketing-related decisions, 4. Identify new business opportunities, 5. Appreciate a variety of techniques for changing attitudes, 6. Learn how to maximize satisfaction and customer loyalty, and 7. Apply a knowledge of consumer behavior to a variety of entities ranging from non-profit organizations to e-commerce.

description.zh: 本課程從全球化觀念來探討品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以全新研究的品牌理論來探討全球品牌的重要關鍵議題，其中包括全球品牌與公司策略的關係與整合、整合品牌概念、新經濟時代的品牌觀念與全球營運模式、整合品牌的執行與評估。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of global branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, profits and non-profit organizations, domestic and global companies, and small and large business. Global Branding Management builds on Global branding Strategy, focusing on the major tactics and tools used by international marketers in managing their global marketing plans.

description.zh: 組織治理(公司治理)在商業的過程中扮演核心角色，提供公司目標及策略上的協助並助其達成期望。也提供讓員工共事的價值觀即確保企業永續經營的收支平衡。在現階段競爭時代當中，本課程除提供同事專業知識外，並以此讓學生瞭解企業運作之道。◆組織治理定義與演進◆組織治理關鍵議題◆組織治理演進◆公司治理架構◆公司治理應用◆公司治理治理維持與發展
description.en: Organizational governance (corporate governance) in the business process plays a central role, providing the company's objectives and strategies to assist and help them achieve their expectations. Also provides the values that the staff worked to ensure business continuity balance. At this stage, the era of competition among colleagues in this course in addition to providing professional knowledge, and thus enable students to understand the operation of the business.◆ definition and evolution of organizational governance◆ key issues of organizational governance◆ the evolution of organizational governance◆ Corporate Governance Framework◆ Application of Corporate Governance◆ governance to maintain and develop corporate governance

name.zh: 個人化智慧型捷運車輛與運作系統
name.en: Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle and Operation System

description.zh: 本課程將未來個人化智慧型捷運車輛科技發展如何面對都市化人口集中、高車輛密度所造成之環境衝擊，能源短缺之節能需求，個人差異化之個人便捷智慧化車輛之需求，及與未來都會新交通網結合之最後一哩路之未來車發展之動向。課程中將以系統、組件、基礎學理介紹未來車之整車發展趨勢、動力種類及性能的追求方向、輕量化結構之材料創新、新能源之應用與系統管理科技之發展。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
description.en: This course introduces the "Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle" and the "Operation System". And it will drive to focus on the future vehicle technology development to face the challenges on the environmental impacts from the growth of the crowed mega cities, on the energy saving due to the shortage of the foil fuel, on the differentiation and ICT innovation from the young people, and on the metropolitan last-mile transportation solution to link with the public transportation system.This course contains numerous fundamental domain knowledge and technologies including vehicle system, powertrain module, energy module, lightweight chassis, environmental policy, infrastructure planning and innovative business model investigation, etc. Students will learn the fundamental knowledge of the future "Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle and Operation System" development.

notes: 與車研合開, 英文授課

name.zh: 新世紀生醫產業創新科技
name.en: Innovative biomedical industries in the new millennium

description.zh: 介紹新興生醫產業的趨勢與其跨領域之特性。課程內容含: 生醫產業簡介, 新世紀人類基因體大計畫, 微生物工程新應用, 新型蛋白質藥劑之開發, 分子醫療診斷之革新, 生醫產業之電腦新科技, 遠距醫療服務新模式, 創新健康管理與保險制度的創新, 生醫產業與科技法律, 生醫產業與社會倫理, 幹細胞新產業, 組織再生新產業, 超級老鼠的誕生, 美美的生醫美容, 抗癌症研究之新科技, 抗傳染疾病之新科技。評分的方式以學生報告為主。
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

notes: 高分所與最後一哩合開限20人12週為2小時及2週6小時

name.en: Special Topics in Molecular Cell Biology

description.zh: 本課程討論細胞培養與基因工程技術之原理與應用，課程內容包涵下列主題：(1) 微生物、植物、昆蟲及動物細胞之特性 (2)細胞於生物反應器的培養，包括各式生物反應器介紹、生物反應器動力學、生物反應器之操作與控制 (3)基因重組蛋白之表現，將包涵不同的細胞載体表現系統 (4)實例探討，如單株抗體、生物高分子材料、基因治療載体等之生產。
description.en: This course discusses the principle and applications of cell culture and molecular biology.  The course covers the following topics: (1) characteristics of microbial, plant, insect, and mammalian cells; (2) cell culture in bioreactors, including descriptions of bioreactor types, operation modes, bioreactor kinetics, and instrumentation and control; (3) expression of foreign genes in various cell systems; (4) case studies, such as production of monoclonal antibody, biopolymers, and gene therapy vectors.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用以發展與分析三維空間多體運動學與動力學的觀念, 定義, 與技巧. 主要課題包括計算動力學簡介, 剛體運動學, 動態方程的構成, 侷限動力學與空間動力學等.
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, definitions, and techniques used for developing and analyzing kinematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics. ematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics.

notes: 綜科327 限24人 限機電學院

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

name.zh: 醫療器材智慧財產權工程
name.en: Intellectual properties engineering on medical devices

description.zh: 本課程目的在使學生了解智慧財產權在醫療器材領域之應用，尤其是專利之佈局，課程中會介紹產業發展趨勢與專利之關係。利用專利資訊進行產品設計與創新工程，也是學習之重點，醫療器材專利價值評估與其管理，亦為本課程之相關內容。
description.en: Course purpose:1. To describe how to use intellectual properties in medical device field2. To use patent information on medical device designs and to do the designing around3. To know patent value and IP managementTo understand how the medical device industry related to IP portfolio

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 課程大綱規劃主要依據上述的四部份分別進行授課，包含固態氧化物燃料電池之原理應用及檢測、潔淨能源技術、變頻式高效率交流液體技術與生質能及敏化染料太陽能技術，分別敘述如下：  1.潔淨能源技術能源概論，非再生能源與再生能源的利用能源的有效變換，未來能源的  發展形態有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。本課程主要是探討燃料電池的製程技術與發展。   a. 燃料電池製程技術介紹(Introduction)    b. 電池效率與開路電壓(Efficiency and Open Circuit Voltage)    c. 操作燃料與電壓(Operational Fuel and Voltage)    d. 中子交換薄膜燃料電池(Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells)    e. 鹼性電解質燃料電池(Alkaline Electrolyte Fuel Cells)    f. 甲烷燃料電池(Direct Methanol Fuel Cells)    g. 中溫與高溫燃料電池(Medium and High Temperature Fuel Cells)   h. 燃料電池之燃料添加(Fuelling Fuel Cells)    i. 壓縮機、透平機、葉扇與?浦(Compressors, Turbines, Ejectors, Fans,   Blowers, and Pumps)    j. 燃料電池之動力輸送(Delivering Fuel Cell Power)    k. 燃料電池之系統分析(Fuel Cell Systems Analyzed)
description.en: This course clean energy covers the fundamentals and applications of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The fundamentals are introductory of the energy source principle and transfer mechanism of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The design and production technologies of the clean energy are introduced and discussed. The examples or other topics of clean energy applications and procedures as well as specifications of the testing are usually regardant in this introductory course.

description.zh: 應用光學(Applied Optics):使學生了解"光機電整合"系統中光學部份的基本原理光系統元件之特性與應用，內容包括；幾何光學、雷射光束傳播、干涉繞射理論、偏極光特性、電光效應、聲光效應、磁光效應、光纖的導波特性、光纖在感測上的應用。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to provide students of fundamental concepts, techniques and applications of optics in an Opto-Electronic integrated system. It may include the theories of geometric options, the propagation of laser beam, the diffraction and interference of light, the characteristics of coherence and polarization, the effects of the Electro-Optic, Magneto-optic modulation, the optical properties of waveguide and optic-fibre, and the applications of optical fibre sensor.

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

description.en: 1. Circuit drawing in Multisim2. Electrical circuit analysis in Multisim3. Electronic circuit analysis in Multisim4. Circuit design in Multisim

description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, and Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies. Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

name.zh: 行動通訊網路原理與實務
name.en: Mobile Telecommunication Networks Principles and Practice

description.zh: 本課程旨在增進電機工程研究所學生對行動電話通訊網路工程實務之了解與分析設計之實作能力，期望學生之所學能與產業科技發展的脈動同步。 內容主要包括： (一) 電信基本概要簡介 (二) 行動電話通訊系統之演進與發展 (三) 蜂巢式行動電話基本網路架構與功能 (四) 臺灣GSM網路運作實例研討 (五) 無線網路之規劃設計與工程實務 (1)信號涵蓋之電腦模擬與路測技術 (2)通話流量與系統容量分析 (3)頻率規劃與干擾研究 (六) 系統優化與網路維運管理實務 (七) 電信公司營運機房與網管中心實地參觀 (八) 射頻規劃之電腦軟體模擬實驗: 在系裡經費許可之前提下提供學生實習網路規劃。
description.en: This course aims to improve EE graduate student's knowledge in mobile telecommunication networks with emphasis on the engineering practice, as well as to train the students to be able to design and analyze the mobile telecommunication networks. The course content includes the following: (1) Fundamentals of Telecommunications (2) Mobile telecom systems evolution and future trend (3) Cellular network structure and functions (4) Taiwan GSM networks case study (5) Wireless networks planning, design and engineering practice 1. RF planning: computer simulation and road test 2. Traffic and capacity analysis 3. Frequency planning and interference study (6) System optimization and network management (7) Site-visiting to Telecomm company's operation center (8) Planning/design simulation using computer software if funding is allowed.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、衡量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。

Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 機器視覺檢測乃結合光學設備 ` 影像處理 ` 與電腦輔助計算處理 , 藉由擷取受測物影像之特徵進行後續各種應用(如檢測 ` 辯識等)。 為確保機器視覺應用之精確度及速度,受測物影像必須依用途進行不同前處理以突顯特徵 , 後以不同之演算法則判斷之擷取特徵是否符合應用要求。 機器視覺近年來大量使用於各產業,除提昇製造業之產品品質外,對人身安全認證之生物科技亦功不可沒 。
description.en: Machine vision has been extensively used in inspection and biometrics in recent years. This course provides the fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision for graduate students. Increasing the knowledge and capability in machine vision for a well-trained industrial engineer is the final goal of this course.

description.zh: 針對存貨理論之簡單介紹，課程內容為確定性模式之經濟批量，連續性與週期性盤點策略，動態性模型與多階段系統。

description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 公共生活環境中存在許多設計上的問題．本課程藉由觀察記錄等研究方法訓練，幫助同學釐清問題核心，並針對公共環境中的產品進行設計提案，滿足不特定多數人的需求．
description.en: There are many design problems in public environment. This course “Public Design” are implemented by teaching observation methods training, to help students clarify the core of the problem, and proposal Design for the public environment eventually. Making all public design meet the specific needs of the majority of users.

description.zh: 使用者導向設計強調「以人為中心」的開發理念，而非以技術為中心；運用「設計思考」之理念，深入探索消費者未被滿足的需求與渴望。本課程以「使用者參與式設計」、「角色與情境故事」、「情境脈絡」等設計方法探索使用者之潛在需求，從研究對象本身的架構來探究行為與現象，挖掘創新概念。
description.en: User-centred Design is a process in which the needs, wants, and limitations of end users of a product are given extensive attention at each stage of the design process. It is a user-oriented innovative design process of discovering users’ potential demand and desire.This course introduces Ethnographic Research Method for discovering Users' Experience and Users' Value Models.  Methods include Participatory Design, User Profiles and Scenarios, Contextual Inquiry and Narrative Practice.Design practices will be carried out for creating broader and effective experience through service and products.

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(一)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(I)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機械設計原理、機密機械特有設計考慮、機械結構件之靜態、動態、與熱傳分析。機械次系統單元如主軸單元、動力驅動、進給驅動、與控制系統等之設計與分析。機械之精度與效能分析。工具機之實務設計與分析個案研究。
description.en: Principles of machine design. Special design considerations in precision machinery. Static dynamic, and thermal analysis of structural members of machine. Analysis of sub-unit of machine like spindle unit, power drive unit, feed drive unit, and control system, etc. Accuracy and performance evaluation of machine, Case study with special emphasis on machine tool.

description.zh: 介紹非傳統加工方法及加工相關的自動化與控制技術，包括：製程控制，數值控制，幾何資料處理，進給驅動器，NC機器的位置量測系統，自動化加工的機器監視與診斷，電腦整合製造。
description.en: Introduce the nontraditional manufacturing methods and related automation and control technology, including: process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, NC machine position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 簡介、數位影像處理的基礎、影像的轉換、影像的增強、影像的復原、影像的壓縮、影像分割、影像的表達及描述、自動車導航及醫學影像的處理和應用、論文討論。
description.en: Introduction, Window operation System, API, DDL, Design of DDE and OLE, Structure of Client/Server System, Multimedia, Image Compression, Graphic supervisory/control system.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

name.zh: 生物科技產品品質安全與管理法規
name.en: The Introduction to Quality,Safety and Regulation of Biology

description.zh: 生物科技產業已是二十一世紀世界各國的重要產業，我國亦視生技產業為繼電子產業後的新興產業，然而生物科技產業與其他科技產業的差異，在於用於人體或具醫療用途的生技產品，除了品質管理外，更須考慮安全與效能，我國與世界各國對於生技產品大都以建置相當程度的法規環境，以有效的管理生技產品並確保人之安全。因此，對於生技產品特有的管理制度以及安全與效能等特殊需求若無正確的認識，將非常不利產業發展。本課程將以疫苗、血液製劑、基因工程製劑、診斷試劑、人體細胞組織產品等目前已研發成熟與正發展中的生技產品為例，從產品設計、品質與製程管制、效能與安全評估、法規環境與管理制度到我國管理方式，以深入淺出的方式做完整的介紹，此外，課程中也將針對生技產業面臨的生物安全問題及其需要的設施、生技產業的挑戰與機會等議題，進行充分的講述與討論。透過此課程，期望學生建立在生技產品品質管理、製程管制、安全評估及產品登記等方面的基本概念，以培養生技產業目前極度缺乏的製程規劃人材。
description.en: In the 21th century, the bio-technological industry has been the important industry in the world.  It is also the most emergent sunrise industry following the electronics industry in Taiwan.  The bio-technological industry is very different from the other technological industries.  The biological products intended for human therapeutic use have to face the needs of safety and efficacy except product quality.  Taiwan government and other countries have established the regulatory framework for biological products to ensure their safety and efficacy.  Therefore, the realization of the management system for biological products is very useful to industry development.This course uses the examples of vaccines, blood products,  recombinant DNA products, diagnostic devices and human cell and tissue-based products to introduce the design control, quality control, process control, evaluation for safety and efficacy and regulatory framework in Taiwan.  The course also discusses the issues of fac

description.zh: 講授並整合設計評價之基本理論。訓練學生針對產品之開發動機、消費者需要(needs)、市場策略、機能佈局、人機介面訴求、造形策略及創意，評估產品設計過程中思考與決策之品質，進而形成改善設計品質之建議。（本課程非本人所提議，以上課程概述僅供參考，並請提議老師指教。）
description.en: Lecture on theory and practice of Design Criticism. Discussions lead toanalysis of quality and effectiveness in design philosophy and practiceamong steps of product development process, including marketing strategy,fulfilling uses' needs, product functioning, ergonomics emphasis and stylingaccent.

name.en: Design Theory and Research in Germany

description.zh: 赴德研習之準備課程；科學理論、計畫理論、傳播理論、美學等創新設計實務相關之理論與研究，以建立專案研發設計之理論基礎。
description.en: This course provides theory and research of design in Germany related topics on Science Theory, Plan Theory, Communication Theory, Esthetics etc. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and simulation verification.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-北科菁英‧放眼國際
name.en: Feast for the global perspective —Going beyond the Campus from Experiences of NTUT Alumni

description.zh: 本課程邀請歷屆傑出校友分享其國際實務經驗，進而激發同學追求國際化的渴望，強化學生對人生願景的規劃，使其在國際交流活動上有更為積極的作用。
description.en: This course invites a number of outstanding alumni to share their experiences and thoughts on developing global perspectives and to instill in students the meaning a global citizen in today's world. The goal is to inspire students to engage in international activities and, ultimately, to plan a future with an international mindset.

notes: 時間ABC，共6週，經管三、經管所最後一哩創創學程合開

name.zh: 創業講座-網路創業面面觀

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，面對這波網路創業風潮，應如何在茫茫網海中嶄露頭角？網路上沒有絕對正確的答案，最好的學習方式就是彼此分享成功經驗。這次講座特別邀請國內知名的網路創業達人，分享他們的創業故事。走吧，跟著這次講座來趟冒險吧！
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor? There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

notes: 時間ABC，共6週，經管三、經管所最後一哩創創學程合開

name.zh: 高速數位訊號完整設計

description.zh: 1.基礎傳輸線理論2.耦合3.非理想的傳輸線效應4.構裝、連接器與穿接腳5.電源供應系統6.電子電路的模擬
description.en: 1.Ideal Transmission line Fundamentals2.Crosstalk3.Nonideal Interconnect Issues4.Connectors, Packages, and Vias5.Nonideal Return Paths, Simultaneous Switching Noise and Power Delivery6.Electronic Circuits Simulations

description.zh: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於展現以上空域上一系列線元組成之陣列天線系統，其可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線系統在空域上所遭遇之干擾。因其具備自動干擾消除之能力，其已是未來無線通信(微波)系統之主流。而本課程之主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本架構概念及處理程序，可為有興趣於通信工程之學生建立實際陣列信號處理概念及系統設計之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他類似領上。
description.en: The primary object of this course is to present the fundamental concept and treatment for spatial signal processing dealing with interference encountered in wirelwss communication by using an adaptive array. It is also the additional purpose of the subjects to provide the analllytic techniques used to predict the performance in other new applications.

notes: 電子所與電資外生專班合開

description.zh: 1.導論2.無失真壓縮技術3.量化與轉換編碼4.動作估計與動作補償5.MPEG視訊編碼標準6.視訊編碼在傳輸時的考量7.無線傳播通道8.無線通訊系統之數位調變技術9.無線通訊系統之通道編碼技術10.多重路徑衰落通道之應對技術11.無線多媒體通訊系統與標準
description.en: 1.Introductions 2.Entropy coding 3.Rate-distortion theory and quantization 4.Motion compensation and Interframe coding5.MPEG video coding 6.Multimedia transmission 7.Wireless propagation channels 8.Digital modulation in wireless systems 9.Channel coding in wireless systems 10.Schemes to overcome multipath fading 11.Standards of wireless multimedia communication systems

notes: 電子所與電資外生專班合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意基本守恒定理，流體運動學，特殊形式方程式，理想流體（二維，三維勢流）表面波，低雷諾數流體，邊界層流體振波．
description.en: Basic Conservation Laws , Flow Kinematics , Special Forms of Governing Equations, Ideal-Fluid Flow ( Two-dimensional , Three-dimensional Potential Flows )Surface Waves , Low-Reynolds-Number Solutions , Boundary Layers , Shock Waves

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將從石油談起，介紹煉油工業主要產品、生產製程及技術，並將介紹供應石化產業基本原料的輕油裂解工場、媒組工場以及其衍生之各種烯烴與芳香烴工業。隨著環保意識高漲，石油工業發展面臨，工安、環保、節能減碳、水資源、化石能源永續性發展等嚴峻挑戰以及面對產業轉型之石化高值化，也是本課程之目標。
description.en: Topics covered: 1. Characteristics of crude, petroleum product and its manufacture.2. Processes technology in petroleum refining & petrochemical manufacture 3. Petrochemicals and its application4. Overview of Taiwan petrochemical industry 5. Industrial safety, environmental concern, energy conservation and sustainability issue in regard to fossil fuel6. High value added & rejuvenation of Taiwan petrochemical industry

description.zh: 1.無線通訊系統簡介2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹3.無線電通訊的傳播原理4.行動通訊之調變技術5.行動通訊之多工技術6.天線﹑多元性與系統分析7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼8.無線網路系統9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎2.影像的轉換3.影像的加強4.影像的復原5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮7.影像的分割與特徵抽取8.影像的表達及描述9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

description.zh: 本課程將探討語音訊號的相關的各種基礎知識與處理技術，包括語音辨認，語音合成與口語對話系統等，並將檢視數個具目前最先進技術的系統，使學生能建立語音信號處理技術之基本知識及能力。課程內容包括：*語音的產生，語音訊號聲學特性與語音知覺的原理*語音分析*語音辨識*語音合成*口語對話系統*目前最先進技術系統*相關進階議題
description.en: In this course, we will introduce fundamental speech signal processing techniques, including speech recognition, speech synthesis and spoken dialogue system and examine some state-of-the-art systems.Content:*Overview of Speech Processing Techniques*Speech Production, Acoustic Phonetics and Psychoacoustic Phenomena*Speech Analysis*Speech Recognition*Speech Synthesis*Spoken Dialog System*State-of-the-Art Systems*Selected Advanced Topics

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 1.MOS元件工作模式及MOSFET原理 2.微小MOSFET的額外考慮 3.矽晶圓的生長 4.擴 散 5.離子植入 6.氧化處理 7.CVD技術 8.微影術 9.蒸鍍與濺鍍 10.光罩製作 11.CMOS IC製程
description.en: 1. Operating modes and theory of MOS devices. 2. Small-geometry effects. 3. Wafer growth. 4. Diffusion. 5. Ion implantation. 6. Oxidation. 7. CVD techniques. 8. Lithography. 9. Sputtering and evaporation. 10. Photo masking. 11. CMOS IC fabrication processing.

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.傅立葉分析 3.微波網路 4.向量網路分析儀 5.頻譜分析儀6.時域反射儀 7.向量信號分析儀 8.天線量測
description.en: 1.Introduction  2.Fourier Analysis 3.Microwave Network 4.Vector Network Analyzer 5.Spectrum Analyzer 6.Time Domain Reflectrometry 7.Vector Signal 8.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 1.解析法 2.變分法 3.動差法 4.有限元素法 5.譜域分析法 6.傳輸線矩陣法
description.en: 1.Analytical Method 2.Variational Method 3.Moment Method 4.Finite 5.Spectral Domain Analysis 6.Transmission Line Matrix

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 可穿戴式應用已成了全球科技產業的新寵兒之一。因此，漸漸地，穿戴式裝置已成為人們生活用品的一部分。本課程討論可穿戴式系統導論、無線感測網路導論、生醫資訊模組設計、可穿戴式教學平台之設計、情境感知遠距監控與定位救援手仗之設計、非視覺型之不穩步態偵測分析設計、自行車玩家生醫資訊守護神設計、遠距醫療照護系統設計、與客製化谷歌智慧型眼鏡設計。本課程主要達成跨領域的高度整合應用訓練課程。
description.en: Wearable applications have been become one new darling of the global technology industries. Hence, gradually, the wearable devices have become part of people's daily necessities. This course will discuss the topics of “Introduction of wearable system, Introduction of wireless sensor network, Design of Bio-information module, Design of wearable teaching platform, Design of Context-Aware Tele-monitor and Position-rescue Staff, Detection Analysis and Design for Unstable Gait with Non-vision Base, Bicycler-Player Bio-information Guardian, Design of Tele-Medicine care system, and Design of customized Google Smart-glass”. This course is highly integrated applications to achieve interdisciplinary training.

name.zh: 軟體定義網路(SDN)架構與應用服

description.zh: 介紹SDN網路與現今網路架構、並說明其主要應用諸如雲端運算應用虛擬網路應用、虛擬儲存應用、集成解決方案及資料中心整合SDN。
description.en: To introduce the architecture of software-defined networking and hardware-defined networking and outline SDN applications such as Cloud computing application、Virtual networking 、Virtual storage 、Aggregation solution and SDN- integrated Data center 。

name.zh: 行動裝置應用程式設計

description.zh: 課程內容包括：1.行動裝置應用程式設計概觀 2.Android SDK 與 Eclipse 開發工具 3.圖形使用者介面 4.多媒體程式設計5.定位及內建感測器程式設計6.資料庫程式設計7.App Store 應用軟體及行銷 8.期末專題製作
description.en: The course content includes: 1. Overview 2. Android SDK and Eclipse Development Tools  3. Graphical User Interface 4. Multimedia Application Design  5. Location and Sensors Application Design 6. Database Application Design 7. App Store and Applications Marketing 8.Final Project

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(一)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 創新講座－產品/服務創新實務
name.en: Innovation Lecture - product and service innovation Practice

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產業專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創產品與服務創新策略之實例教學，策劃符合技術發展企業「整合跨領域資源與知識」經營體質，並滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品及服務，使學術與產業互動交流縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course through lectures and conferences with industry experts, will also teach about existing cases of product and service innovation practice. aim to teach about solving the problem of economic development of Taiwan through the way and method of innovation design; and to plan out the “Integration of interdisciplinary resources and knowledge” operating conditions fitting with technology development enterprise and products according needs of markets and users. This course also aims to increase interactivities of academic and industry.

notes: ABC三節，6週，工設系與創新所'創創學程'最後一哩合開

name.zh: 工作坊:文學與電影製作

description.zh: 本課程採工作坊方式進行，學生需將文學作品轉譯成電影成品。課程之初將擇一文學作品，仔細分析其語言、語調、風格、內涵、人物及主題，然後合力將原作改編成電影腳本，依據電影三元素: 意象、時間和聲音的準則進行拍攝。在實踐的過程中，學生需學習承擔責任與完成任務，藉此加強團隊合作和互信互助的精神，才能克服拍攝過程中的種種困難和技術問題，進而培養運用文字和語言的彈性和創意。
description.en: In this course students will translate a work from one medium-literature-into another medium-film.  Beginning with a careful analysis of the language, tone, style, connotations, characters, and themes in the work of literature, students will then learn about the three basic principles of cinema-Images + Time + Sound-and they will then recreate a version of the original work in the medium of cinema.  This course will demand an emphasis on team-work and mutual trust; an ability to work toward a goal while overcoming numerous practical and aesthetic problems; an ability to be flexible and creative using the basic principles of both literary and cinematic language; and also an ability to acc ept responsibility and to fulfill tasks while working independently.

description.zh: 進階職場專業英文針對本校碩博士生設計系列最後一哩之實務專業課程。課程內容以英語全球溝通為主軸，強化商業寫作、簡報、會議及談判等技巧及能力。
description.en: The course provides essential and pragmatic English language used in real workplace. As it is designed for postgraduate students, the course also takes into account students’ academic studies as well as centers on students’ future career prospects. Students are expected to practice and refine their English communication skills, in particular correspondence writing and speaking. In that vein, students will be required to compose business correspondence, such as letters, emails and memos, and also to perform in simulated meetings and to brief progress report in English.

notes: 824R工管管理博合開做為英文能力畢業標準不計畢業學分

description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

notes: 電子四甲乙與電子所合開

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.類比設計概述2.基本MOS元件物理特性3.單級放大器4.差動放大器5.頻率響應6.雜訊分析7.回授8.運算放大器9.振盪器10.鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.zh: 1.機率簡介 2.機率分佈 3.統計概論 4.抽樣分析 5.參數估計 6.區間估計 7.假設檢定 8.迴歸分佈 9.統計品管 10.變異分析
description.en: Introduction to probability Probability distribution Introduction to statistics Sampling analysis Quality control

description.zh: 模具工程不只要讓初學者熟悉模具的設計，而且要讓有經驗的模具設計者也能夠以工程的方法來設計模具。此外模具工程也提供塑膠工業相關的從業人員瞭解模具知識，如銷售員與售後服務人員。課程內容分為四大部分：(1)基礎─包含模具、射出機、塑膠材料、產品等。(2)模具設計的一般方針─模具佈置、澆口、流道、排氣、頂出、模具冷卻等。(3)模具的規格：模具零件與材料、模具加工、強度與疲勞。(4) 模具性能：模具壽命、成形週期、成形品之肉厚、尺寸、形狀等。 (5)特殊成形法：共射、埋入件、氣輔、覆蓋、微射出、金屬射出、陶瓷射出等。
description.en: Mold Engineering is to familiarize not only beginners in mold design but also more experienced mold designers with an engineering approach to mold design. In addition, mold engineering is also recommended mold knowledge to any individuals, such as sales and service personnel, in the plastic industry who need to understand mold in their activities. This course is divided into four sections: (1) Basics about Mold, Injection Machine, Plastics, and Products. (2) General Mold Design Guideline: mold layout, gate, runner, venting, ejection, mold cooling. (3) Specification of the Mold: mold parts and material, mold machining, strength and fatigue. (4) Mold Performance: mold life, cycle time, wall thickness, product size and shape. (5) Special Injection Molding: Coinjection molding, Insert molding, Gas-assistant injection molding, over molding, micro injection molding, Metal injection molding, Ceramic injection molding.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育行政領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, trends and research in educational administration. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 藉了解環境變遷與建築科技發展之歷程與現況，並藉由研究課題之形成背景與研究方法之探討分析，以及研發成果與運用之介紹，引發學生對建築科技發展之興趣，進而掌握未來建築發展與研究之趨勢與課題。    課程內容將包括：當前建築科技研發趨勢1.都市防災空間系統規劃與GIS、GPS、RS等新興科技之防災應用研究。2.氣候變遷議題與都市及建築低衝擊開發防災型都市更新策略 3.建築防火安全技術研發與應用（含防火安全性能法規之研發）4.綠建築與居住環境科技研發與應用5.綠建材與室內環境品質管理6.智慧化居住空間科技研發與智慧綠建築推動方案7.高齡少子化社會之都市及建築環境通用設計發展8.住宅問題與政策研析及住宅性能評估之探討9.BIM(建築資訊模型)之發展與運用10.智慧綠建築與展示空間參訪藉由國內外科技研發成果實質運用案例之討論 及（或）研發實驗機構之參訪，增強學生對建築與都市相關科技研發之興趣，進而掌握未來研究趨勢與相關課題。
description.en: 1.	By reviewing the historical relationship between environment change and the building science and technology development, to find the issues, research methods and current accomplishments of building technology. 2.	By lectures, discussions and new building technical tours to encourage students to be interested in future development of building science and technology and understand the way to do their advanced study on those topics.

notes: 內政部建築研究所何明錦所長授課

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意科技研發專案管理之個案研究. 有關科技開發案之技術開發管理, 人力責任管理及時間任務管理等PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action)之實務探討
description.en: The cases study of the management of R/D projects. The method of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) cycling will be studied and discussed in each case.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 高性能混凝土之特性，材料，配比設計及試驗，品質管制，施工規範及構件行為。
description.en: This course focuses on the characteristics of high performance concrete, composition materials, mixture design and testing, quality management, construction specifications, as well as structural behavior.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹(2)完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b)直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c)變異分析。(3)應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料

The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 課程介紹大氣中不同化學物質之間在各種相態下熱力平衡與物理轉換過程，以及其在大氣中各種過程所扮演的角色。並以數學與物理的方法來探討化學之原理，物質之結構與性質。內容包括大氣成分的介紹、大氣物質循環及生命期、光化學及反應動力學、平流層及對流層主要化學機制、大氣化學轉換模式等。
description.en: This course deals with the principle of chemistry, structure and properties of matter by the material and physical methods. Topics include atmospheric composition, global cycles and lifetimes, atmospheric photochemistry and chemical kinetics, chemistry of the stratosphere, chemistry of the troposphere, atmospheric chemical transport models, etc.

name.zh: 就業達人講座:職涯多元方程式
name.en: Lecture: Diverse formula of career Ⅰ

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「就業達人講座-職涯多元方程式」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享面試應對技巧、魅力溝通表達、職場自我行銷、職場生涯規劃以及職場時間管理、壓力管理等議課題，提昇學生對於職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students’ competition and ability in the workplace. The course contains some subjects including tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career etc. By these topics, students will have variety of skills about interview and management that needed in the workplace to raise employment rate.

notes: ABC節，為期6週。最後一哩.大學部與研究所合50人

description.zh: 本課程的目的是提升學生的科技英文技能和協助他們進階職場的實用英語需求. 此課程著重於科技英語之閱讀、聽力、口語、寫作、理解、語法規則、詞彙,發音,對話,商務溝通,和專業演講技巧. 本課程包括撰寫履歷, 面試技巧, 軟技能如溝通技巧, 職場禮節; email及電話技巧,出差英語, 判斷力,了解國際科技職場環境及工作需求,專業項目策劃及執行.輔導學生如何展現自己優勢及作好個人職業規劃,從而順利邁向成功目標.
description.en: This course aims to educate students in Information Technology English and prepare students for their career advancement. This course focuses on IT science and technology English reading, listening, speaking, writing, comprehension, grammar rules, vocabulary, pronunciation, conversation, communication, and professional presentation skills. This course also covers soft skills such as interview tips, communication, business etiquette, travel English, email English, decision making, understanding international business, global working environment, project management planning and execution. In addition, this course offers personal development for students to discover their personal advantage and perform their career planning for achieving career goals.

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過案例的企劃，協助學生從Web的設計領域，跨入到Mobile App的領域當中，可以充分發揮iPhone和Android的平台特色，做出真正具備使用者經驗的App (應用程式)。課程以實際分組討論結合 Paper Prototype的方式，以UCD（User-Centered Design）的精神，分組進行工作坊形式的體驗教學，企劃出具有創意並可行的應用程式。課程所談的App應用程式企劃，以iPhone和Android為主。
description.en: This course is to plan for application programming with concentration on user experience from PC design to mobile devices such as iPhone and Android. Curriculum and instruction characterizes paper prototype, cooperative learning, and workshop. Criteria for program evaluation are innovation, feasible and user-centered design.

notes: 博碩合開課程, 與職互動所合開上課

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 本課程旨在瞭解台灣地域文化中，因人、因時、因地制宜的建築生產過程，及其涉入空間行為因時間積累而呈現的特殊環境型態、類型與結構；即在探討地方自然地理環境，如何經由人類行為的涉入，呈現出富鄉土涵構的人文景觀。
description.en: This course is to understand the relations between human, behavior, material and the environment of architecture in the world. And try to introduce the vernacular characters of Taiwan architecture by the discussion of some special architectural themes.

description.zh: 本課程目的在培養學生具備企業應用資訊基礎知識，修習課程後預計達成下列目標：1.協助學生認識商業運作實務，從產業、行業到企業組織，並能瞭解企業中重要職能與分工。2.協助學生具備資訊基礎知識，包含軟體、硬體的應用，並建立軟體開發、資料基礎觀念。3.透過實務引導、小組合作與案例發表學習方式，協助學生建立職場應有的態度與基礎技能。

description.zh: 本課程目的在協助學生具備ERP配銷模組實作能力，修習課程後預計達成下列目標：1.協助學生取得ERP配銷模組證照，強化職場就業競爭力。2.透過講師示範、案例實作以及上機模擬，協助學生強化系統應用與企業流程整合觀念。3.採用分組方式協助學生強化團隊合作，透過上機模擬體驗企業應用ERP系統使用情境。

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.
